attributes.action: Overrule approval for the building of the Tulip tower (20 Bury Street)
attributes.background:
Help block the construction of the Tulip tower which will irreversibly damage the London skyline.
At 305m, it will be almost as tall as the Shard, and will have an unsightly bulge at the top. 
However, Sadiq Khan can block the decision in the next 14 days. Help us protect London’s identity.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the Mayor of London. You can find out more here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/what-we-do/planning/planning-applications-and-decisions/what-powers-does-mayor-have-planning
